title: Crypto App
description: Comprehensive cryptocurrency tracking app with real-time market data, detailed charts, news feed, portfolio management, and exchange exploration. Built with Flutter, Firebase, OneSignal, and Google Ads.

title: SkillSync Pro
description: AI-powered productivity coach with Pomodoro timer, goal tracking, progress statistics, AI chat assistant, and offline support using Hive. Features Firebase Auth and smart notifications.

title: MindMate
description: Smart mental health companion with AI-powered chat assistant (Gemini 2.0 Flash), conversation history, live typing effects, and Firebase authentication. Modern UI with interactive features.

title: HireMe
description: AI-powered career assistant for discovering remote jobs, creating professional CVs with elegant templates, and receiving career advice. Features job search, CV builder with PDF export, and WhatsApp/email sharing.
